title: LF Top Laner to join a 5 man q
body:
Pref Plat+, Skype is a must, a friendly attitude to playing and learning new things as we climb the ranks as a 5 man q. looking for someone that likes meta champion. and pref 16+
Add and message me in game and we can talk

replies.body: LOL Wassup my %%%%% send us a text i gotchu fam
i am 10, not very old but im defs very mature ^^^^.^^^^. I'm a spider! I deserve challenger and I know it, my team drags me down, need some gud ppl on me tem.
